subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ales Hemsky scored the go-ahead goal in the second period and Dwayne Roloson had 31 saves and an assist for the Edmonton Oilers in their victory over the Anaheim Mighty Ducks in Game 1 of the Western Conference finals.
